details.title: Numerical simulation system for casting process in concurrent engineering
details.abstract: According to the implementing principle and application background of the Concurrent Engineering (CE) project, studies on the integration of numerical simulation system for casting process with CE, simulation of turbulent phenomena in filling process of casting by Algebraic Stress Model (ASM), computation efficiency of filling process and quantitative prediction of shrinkage cavity and porosity under feeding condition of several risers are discussed. After the simulation of casting process of typical magnesium based alloy casting with complicated structure, remarkable success in assuring the quality is also presented.
